title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 550.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 550.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

The people's right to know the process of government
decision-making and the documents and statistics leading to determinations is
basic to our society. This Part provides information concerning the procedures
by which records may be obtained from the New York State Office of Information

Technology Services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
550.1

Amended

New

York State Register April 4, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 14, eff. 4/4/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
